next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 3-5 potential themes or concepts for the poetry project (e.g., nature, loss, urban life). Add these to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Research and identify 2-3 poets whose style resonates with the desired direction of this project. Document findings in 'Ideas'.",
"Write a short (8-12 line) free verse poem exploring one of the brainstormed themes. Add to 'Progress' as a first draft.",
"Define the overall *scope* of the project - e.g., number of poems, specific form (if any), intended audience. Document in 'Ideas'.",
"Create a 'To Do' list within the 'Issues' list, outlining specific tasks needed to reach the defined scope (e.g., 'write 5 sonnets', 'find publishing venues')."
